alert.note: Alert for Lane (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 29 at 3:05PM CDT until March 30 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 9 PM CDT THURSDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 044... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 1 PM to 9 PM CDT Thursday. * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 044 Lane. * WINDS...South 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
